H5086.def: = process by which the wind causes objects to be moved from one place to the other

H1749.def: = solid, yellowish substance ◄ secreted by bees; ► used in different ways; ≈ melts before fire and so becomes a metaphor for disappearance, destruction, and death

H4549.def: = process by which substances become soft, ◄ often as a result of  a higher temperature

H784.def: = state of burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and give out bright light, heat, and smoke; ► used for cooking, melting, cleansing, heating, and destroying; ≈ many aspects of life are compared with fire, such as anger, jealousy, aggression, wickedness, words, life, certain sicknesses, suffering, etc.

H7563.def: = state in which a person's behavior is inconsistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior

H6.def: = state of not being located in the place where it is expected to be

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H6662.def: = state in which a person's or deity's behavior is fully consistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior

H8055.def: = state in which humans and deities feel and show great joy

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H7797.def: poetic term; = state in which humans and deities feel and show great joy

H8057.def: = state in which humans feel and show great joy

H7891.def: = action by which one utters words with a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H2167.def: = action by which one expresses one's respect and gratitude to someone else by uttering words at a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not

H8034.def: = one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity

H5549.def: literally: to make high; hence: = causative action by which humans create a road or access ramp by covering the surface of the ground with thicks layers of sand

H7392.def: = action by which humans ride on a domestic animal such as a {L:donkey<SDBH:חֲמֹור>} or a {L:horse<SDBH:סוּס>} or in a {L:chariot<SDBH:מֶרְכָּבָה>}

H3050.def: = short form of {L:יהוה<SDBH:יהוה>}, only found in poetic texts

H1.def: = direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

H3490.def: = person whose father has passed away and therefore unable to care for himself; ≈ regarded as one of the weaker members of the society and should therefore receive special care, together with the aliens, the widows, and other people who are poor

H1781.def: = a person whose responsibility it is to give a verdict on a case or person in a dispute and ensure that the verdict is implemented, which, ideally, results in vindication for the innocent and punishment for the guilty; this can only be done by someone in authority, such as a judge or ruler or even God himself

H490.def: = woman whose husband has died and therefore has difficulty caring for herself; ≈ regarded as one of the weaker members of the society and should therefore receive special care, together with the aliens, the fatherless, and other people who are poor

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H6944.def: = state in which a deity differs from humans and other deities in that he cannot be associated with anything that is in any way profane or tainted by sin or other impurities, which is a quality that he desires to see in everything else as well

H4583.def: = a location that deities, humans or animals have made their dwelling place; ≈ associated with security

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H3173.def: = state in which humans are not part of a larger group or community

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H615.def: = person who is locked up in a prison or other location where one does not have the freedom to act and go at will

H3574.def: meaning unsure; possibly: = state in which everything is right

H389.def: = particle marking a constituent as representing a limited number of entities

H5637.def: = state by which humans or animals stand up to or oppose the authority of a person or ruler or deity

H6707.def: = land without vegetation; ≈ associated with hardship

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H6805.def: = action by which humans put one foot before the other in order to move forward

H3452.def: = area without water and therefore without vegetation and settlers; sometimes taken as the name of one specific region

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H637.def: = the two external openings in the nose

H8064.def: = the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day

H5197.def: = process by which liquids flow in small drops

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H5514.def: = mountain and surrounding desert on the Sinai Peninsula in Egypt, also known as Mount {L:Horeb<SDBH:חֹורֵב>}; ► location where {L:YHWH<SDBH:יהוה>} entered into a {L:covenant<SDBH:בְּרִית>} with {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H5130.def: = action by which humans hold an object in their hands and move it to and fro, ► probably in order to signal to a deity that the object in their hands is intended for them

H5071.def: = state in which humans are willing to perform a certain task and show that by their actions

H1653.def: = water that has fallen as rain

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H3559.def: = state in which an object is firmly and immovably located in a certain place

H3811.def: = action by which humans spend all their forces on a certain activity

H5159.def: = process by which possessions are transferred from one generation to the next

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H3559.def: = state in which an object is firmly and immovably located in a certain place

H6041.def: = a class of people who are suffering, often because of poverty but also because of an oppressive external situation; ≈ associated with humility

H136.def: originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of {L:אָדֹון<SDBH:אָדֹון>}: = way of addressing God as master and lord

H562.def: = words spoken by humans and deities

H7227.def: = state in which an object is very large in size

H6635.def: = state of being in the service of the community; ≈ sometimes associated with suffering and heavy labor

H1319.def: = action by which humans pass on information to someone else, having been commissioned to do so by a deity or another person

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H6635.def: = state of being in the service of the community; ≈ sometimes associated with suffering and heavy labor

H5074.def: = action by which humans or animals move away in haste from a certain place ► in order to escape from a situation that is considered dangerous

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H2505.def: = causative action by which humans or deities divide an object (or range of objects) into portions; ► usually with the intention to use one or more of these portions for a particular purpose

H518.def: = marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

H7901.def: = state or action by which a human being or animal is in or assumes a horizontal position; ► in order to rest, sleep, or have sex with someone, or because of being unable to stand up as a result of weakness or death; ≈ sometimes associated with security

H996.def: = the area separating two or mores locations

H8240.def: meaning uncertain; possibly: = area enclosed by a stone wall or hedge made of branches and thorns, with a narrow opening which can be closed with brush or by the shepherd’s body; ► used for keeping sheep at night to protect them from thieves or wild animals

H3671.def: = part of body; ◄ of bird, insect, celestial creature; ► used for flying but also to give protection

H3123.def: = a bird with a blue-gray color with a pinkish sheen to the neck feathers and a black tip on its tail; lives  in large colonies and eats mainly seeds; courts, mates, and has nests several times a year; nests on rock ledges; ◄ |iColumba livia|i*; ► used as food and for sacrifices; ≈ regarded as swift, docile, and innocent, but also as silly and senseless; associated with affection, fertility and sexuality because of its mating habits; the moaning sound this bird sometimes makes is associated with pain and suffering

H2645.def: = causative action by which humans cover an object with a thin layer of a substance, such as cloth, metal, or wood

H3701.def: = silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins

H3422.def: = state in which cloth, leather, or stone has the pale green color of mildew

H84.def: = part of body; ◄ of bird; ► used for flying but also for protecting its young; ≈ associated with safety and security

H7706.def: = deity; ◄ of Israel; traditionally: Almighty One; better: All-sufficient One (= the One every good and perfect gift comes from); ≈ another name for Israel's God

H6566.def: = causative action by which humans spread out an object, such as a piece of cloth, a net, or a document either horizontally or vertically

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H7949.def: = the process by which white flakes of frozen crystallized vapor fall from the sky and cover the ground

H2022.def: = a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a {L:hill<SDBH:גִּבְעָה>}

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H1316.def: = region; ◄ north-east of the River {L:Jordan<SDBH:יַרְדֵּן>}, ► at one time ruled by king {L:Og<SDBH:עֹוג>}, later assigned to half of the tribe of {L:Manasseh<SDBH:מְנַשֶּׁה>}

H1386.def: exact meaning unknown; probably: = top of a mountain or hill

H4100.def: = a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified

H2022.def: = a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a {L:hill<SDBH:גִּבְעָה>}

H1386.def: exact meaning unknown; probably: = top of a mountain or hill

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H2530.def: = process by which humans or deities experience an eager desire for a person or object

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H637.def: = the two external openings in the nose

H5331.def: poetic term: = a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, usually in the future

H7393.def: = upper stone of two stones ► that are used to grind grain into flour; the grain was placed on the stationary bottom stone, and the top stone was pressed down on top of the grain and scraped back and forth

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H7239.def: = state in which a countable entity is ten thousand in number; ≈ associated with excessively high numbers by which the exact number is relatively unimportant

H505.def: = generic term for domesticated oxen, both male and female; ► kept for milk and used for plowing

H136.def: originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of {L:אָדֹון<SDBH:אָדֹון>}: = way of addressing God as master and lord

H6944.def: = state in which a deity differs from humans and other deities in that he cannot be associated with anything that is in any way profane or tainted by sin or other impurities, which is a quality that he desires to see in everything else as well

H5514.def: = mountain and surrounding desert on the Sinai Peninsula in Egypt, also known as Mount {L:Horeb<SDBH:חֹורֵב>}; ► location where {L:YHWH<SDBH:יהוה>} entered into a {L:covenant<SDBH:בְּרִית>} with {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H5927.def: = process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself

H4791.def: = a position of a relatively high elevation above the earth

H7617.def: = a person or group that has been forcibly carried off into slavery or exile

H120.def: = human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between {L:male<SDBH:זָכָר>} and {L:female<SDBH:נְקֵבָה>}; ≈ associated with mortality

H637.def: = the two external openings in the nose

H5637.def: = state by which humans or animals stand up to or oppose the authority of a person or ruler or deity

H3050.def: = short form of {L:יהוה<SDBH:יהוה>}, only found in poetic texts

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H1288.def: = causative action by which humans cause animals to fall on their knees

H136.def: originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of {L:אָדֹון<SDBH:אָדֹון>}: = way of addressing God as master and lord

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H410.def: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H3444.def: = causative action by which humans or deities come to the rescue or protection (of humans in need) implying success

H410.def: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H4190.def: = causative action by which humans or deities come to the rescue of humans in need

H136.def: originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of {L:אָדֹון<SDBH:אָדֹון>}: = way of addressing God as master and lord

H3069.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H8444.def: = a place through which one can leave a building or town

H4194.def: = process by which humans or animals stop living

H389.def: = particle marking a constituent as representing a limited number of entities

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H4272.def: = action by which humans strike other humans or animals with a hammer, club or similar object, resulting in breaking the underlying bones

H7218.def: = upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

H341.def: = state in which someone is engaged in a conflict with  someone else and acts accordingly

H8181.def: = the fine thread-like strands growing from the skin of humans and certain animals

H6936.def: = upper part of the head; ≈ sometimes used in conjunction with "{L:feet<SDBH:רֶגֶל>}" to refer to the whole physical body

H1980.def: = process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

H817.def: = state of being responsible for an unlawful deed, that was committed either knowingly or unknowingly

H136.def: originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of {L:אָדֹון<SDBH:אָדֹון>}: = way of addressing God as master and lord

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H7725.def: = action by which humans face a direction different from the one they were facing before

H1316.def: = region; ◄ north-east of the River {L:Jordan<SDBH:יַרְדֵּן>}, ► at one time ruled by king {L:Og<SDBH:עֹוג>}, later assigned to half of the tribe of {L:Manasseh<SDBH:מְנַשֶּׁה>}

H4688.def: = a very low area of the earth

H3220.def: = a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water

H7272.def: = the lower part of the lower limb of the body of humans, animals, and --by extension-- of deities, which in some contexts may include the full leg; ► used for standing and walking; ≈ associated with authority, and also used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H4272.def: = action by which humans strike other humans or animals with a hammer, club or similar object, resulting in breaking the underlying bones

H1818.def: = red liquid that circulates in the arteries and veins of humans and animals; ► used in rituals such as sacrifices, purification and covenant ceremonies, and never to be eaten; ≈ regarded as the seat of {L:life<SDBH:נֶפֶשׁ>}; human blood, when flowing from the body, pollutes the body and the land

H341.def: = state in which someone is engaged in a conflict with  someone else and acts accordingly

H3956.def: = the fleshy organ in the mouth, used for tasting, licking, swallowing, and (in the case of humans) speaking

H3611.def: = relatively small light brown domestic animal, feeding on anything from household refuse to animal carcasses and excreta; ◄ |iCanis familiaris putiatini|i*; ► extremely unclean animal and therefore not to be eaten, though used for hunting and for watching sheep; ≈ considered almost as unclean as a {L:pig<SDBH:חֲזִיר>}; associated with all sorts of uncleanness, aggression, greediness, low status; used as derogatory term for male shrine prostitutes

H7200.def: = process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily --though not necessarily exclusively-- with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

H1979.def: = action by which humans move forward, usually towards a specific destination

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H410.def: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H6944.def: = state in which a deity differs from humans and other deities in that he cannot be associated with anything that is in any way profane or tainted by sin or other impurities, which is a quality that he desires to see in everything else as well

H7891.def: = action by which one utters words with a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not

H6923.def: = action by which humans place themselves in front of individuals or groups, facing either forward or backward, ► and either with good or with evil intentions; ≈ sometimes used figuratively in situations where humans come before God in worship, or where God confronts enemies, or when certain conditions are personified

H5059.def: = action by which humans play an instrument with strings, such as a {L:lute<SDBH:כִּנֹּור>} or {L:lyre<SDBH:נֵבֶל>}, which can be for silent meditation or to accompany singing and dancing

H310.def: = the side or part of something away from the spectator or from the direction in which it moves or faces

H1288.def: = causative action by which humans cause animals to fall on their knees

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H4721.def: = relatively large group of people ► come together for a specific purpose

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H4726.def: = an opening in the earth that gives access to the subterranean water which either comes to the surface or can be drawn from it; ≈ its water is regarded as a source of life and well-being

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H1144.def: = man (called {L:Ben-Oni<SDBH:בֶּן־אֹונִי>} by his mother), tribe, and territory; ◄ twelfth and last son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and second son of {L:Rachel<SDBH:רָחֵל>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H6810.def: literally: small; hence: = state in which humans are considered unworthy of honor and respect

H7287.def: = action by which humans or deities exercise authority over (other) humans, animals, and areas, often with focus on the manner in which this is done

H8269.def: = someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

H7277.def: meaning unsure; possibly: = a large crowd of people

H2074.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ tenth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and sixth son of {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H5321.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ sixth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and second son of {L:Bilhah<SDBH:בִּלְהָה>}, slave of {L:Rachel<SDBH:רָחֵל>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H5797.def: = state in which an object is able to withstand force

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H5810.def: = state in which humans or deities have the ability to exert force

H6466.def: = action by which a person or deity carries out some purposeful activity, in order to create something or cause something to happen

21.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

61.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

91.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

111.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H1964.def: = a building or set of buildings, distinguished from other constructions or houses by its magnificence ► and function, which is either religious or political

H3389.def: = town, formerly referred to as {L:Salem<SDBH:שָׁלֵם>} and {L:Jebus<SDBH:יְבוּס>};◄ located on Mt. {L:Zion<SDBH:צִיֹּון>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► conquered by king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, who made it the capital of his kingdom

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H2986.def: = causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans or inanimate objects to move or be moved from one place to another

H1605.def: = action by which humans or deities speak to animals, humans, deities, or natural objects in anger, in order to express their displeasure and cause them to change their behavior

H7070.def: = a tall grass with stiff, sharply-pointed leaves and a plume-like flower head that reaches to more than 2 m; it grows in lakes and streams, the roots creeping across the bottom of the lake to produce new leaves and stalks; or on riverbanks; ◄ Phragmites australis (Common reed) or Arundo donax (Giant reed); ► used for baskets, mats, flutes, pens, arrows, and roof-coverings; ≈ symbol of weakness and undependability, but also flexibility

H5712.def: = a large gathering of humans or creatures ► usually for a specific purpose

H47.def: = male bovine; ≈ symbol of deities and associated with power and strength, but also with aggression and therefore often used to denote people who behave as such

H5695.def: = male young of a {L:cow<SDBH:פָּרָה>}; ► used as a symbol for a deity; also used as sacrifice; ≈ associated with being willful and untrained

H7511.def: = action by which animals tread heavily and noisily on objects, ► resulting in destruction

H7518.def: meaning unsure; possibly: = a small part of an object

H3701.def: = silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins

H967.def: = action by which someone takes a number of objects, divides them, and gives them to different people

H2654.def: = state in which humans and deities are emotionally attached to (other) humans

H7128.def: = armed conflict in which weapons are used to attack an enemy

H2831.def: meaning unsure; possibly: = object; ◄ made out of bronze; ► function not specified; ≈ regarded as valuable

H857.def: = to move to a certain location, seen from that location's perspective

H4714.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Ham<SDBH:חָם>}; ► regarded as founder of the {L:Egyptian<SDBH:מִצְרִי>} nation

H3568.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Ham<SDBH:חָם>}; ► regarded as ancestor of the {L:Cushites<SDBH:כּוּשִׁי>}

H7323.def: = action by which humans walk at a relatively high speed

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H7891.def: = action by which one utters words with a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H4467.def: = state in which a person or deity has been entrusted with the office of {L:king<SDBH:מֶלֶךְ>} or {L:queen<SDBH:מַלְכָּה>}

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H2167.def: = action by which one expresses one's respect and gratitude to someone else by uttering words at a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not

H136.def: originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of {L:אָדֹון<SDBH:אָדֹון>}: = way of addressing God as master and lord

H7392.def: = action by which humans ride on a domestic animal such as a {L:donkey<SDBH:חֲמֹור>} or a {L:horse<SDBH:סוּס>} or in a {L:chariot<SDBH:מֶרְכָּבָה>}

H8064.def: = the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day

H5797.def: = state in which an object is able to withstand force
= state in which an object is able to withstand force

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H1346.def: = state in which a substance increases in volume, which manifests itself in an increasing height

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H3372.def: = state in which humans experience fear

H4720.def: = part of an object that is considered more holy than the rest

H410.def: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H5797.def: = state in which an object is able to withstand force

H8592.def: = state in which humans have physical, political, or military strength

H1288.def: = causative action by which humans cause animals to fall on their knees
